# UINavigationItem.SearchBarPlacement.automatic

**Case**

A constant that places the search bar according to the current layout.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Constants

- **inline**: A constant that places the search bar on the trailing edge of the navigation bar, inline with the other content.
- **UINavigationItem.SearchBarPlacement.stacked**: A constant that stacks the search bar vertically below the other content in the navigation bar.

items.description: A constant that places the search bar on the trailing edge of the navigation bar, inline with the other content.
